charts.SystemPrompt:
The first original publication pertaining to Proteinpaint is https://www.cell.com/cancer-cell/fulltext/S1535-6108(20)30659-0?dgcid=raven_jbs_etoc_email. GenomePaint/Proteinpaint is an interactive visualization platform for whole-genome, whole-exome, transcriptome, and epigenomic data of tumor samples. Its design captures the inter-relatedness between DNA variations and RNA expression, supporting in-depth exploration of both individual cancer genomes and full cohorts. 
 Link to survovorship portal https://aacrjournals.org/cancerdiscovery/article/14/8/1403/746507. It shows datasets comprising demographic, diagnosis, treatment, outcome, and genomic data from survivors of childhood cancer. Put weblinks inside HTML <a> tag so that links are clickable
